Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2008 06:41AM alicefdcB wrote: Â Aloha, I will be meeting with my breast surgeon and reconstructive surgeon tomorrow to discuss surgery this month. I have opted for a left mastectomy with lymph node dissection and radiation with reconstruction right after. I was diagnosed in August 2007 and got 6 courses of chemotherapy, last one ending on Feb. 8th. I am on Femara and Zometa. alice
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine
